alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 3:57PM EDT until July 30 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morgan, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morgan, Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Iveys Mill, Milford, Crestview, Commissary Hill, Turman, Bermuda, Elmodel Wma, Bethany, Patmos, Dickey and Rowena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
